audioText: Mes amis seront très contents demain soir.
question: Complete the sentence with the correct form of "être"
explanation: The text states 'Mes amis seront très contents demain soir.' - My friends will be very happy tomorrow evening. 'Seront' is the future tense of 'être' (to be) for third person plural. The phrase 'demain soir' (tomorrow evening) indicates future time.
source: Future tense practice with common emotions
